name.str_pl: pairs of 2-by-shin guards

description: A pair of improvised shin guards made from broken pieces of a plank that are tied to your shins with rags and string.

name.str_pl: pairs of carpet leg guards

description: Small squares of carpet rolled around your shins and thighs.  Perfect for wading through the local furniture store.
//: The weight assumes four squares of carpet of about 25cm x 30cm.

name.str_pl: pairs of carpet greaves

description: Small squares of carpet rolled around your shins.  These might protect you from the corner of a table.
//: The weight assumes two squares of carpet of about 25cm x 30cm.

description: A pair of leg guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.

description: A heavy pair of protective overalls worn by firefighters as protection against heat.

pairs of cataphract leggings

description: This leg armor, made of interlocking plates of burnished bronze, appears to be either a high-quality recreation or a genuine artifact.  Despite having an ancient design, it is in mint condition aside from some battle damage.  It covers from the upper thigh to the lower shin, and is of extremely high quality.
A pair of black leather chaps.  Very tough and light, but doesn't offer any storage.

A pair of tough chaps made of Kevlar.  Chainsaw kickbacks are potentially fatal; personal protective equipment like these chaps help protect your femoral arteries.  The layered Kevlar is designed to fray on contact with the chain and bind up the tool.
A pair of reinforced pants used by fencers to prevent injuries.  They don't cover the lower leg.

name.str_pl: pairs of knee pads

description: A pair of knee pads made of stout plastic and cloth.

description: A pair of bronze leg guards with a simple leather lining.

pairs of XS bronze greaves
pairs of hard leg guards

description: A pair of polyurethane leg guards with neoprene backing.

name.str_pl: pairs of steel leg guards

description: A full assembly of medieval leg protection.  Cuisses, poleyns, and greaves, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of sheet metal leg guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal leg guards

description: A pair of leg guards hammered out of metal and shaped to tie on to the upper and lower leg, avoiding joints.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 25cm x 30cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal leg guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal leg guards

description: These crude leg guards have been hardened to further protect your legs from the mighty coffee table, destroyer of shins.

name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal greaves

description: A pair of shin guards hammered out of metal and shaped to tie on to the lower leg.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 25cm x 30cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal greaves
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal greaves

description: These crude greaves have been hardened to further protect your shins.
Four cut-down sheets of metal hanging off your waist to keep your hip and groin safe.  They're held in place rather loosely, but still get in the way a lot when running.
//: The weight assumes 2 sheets of about 30cm x 50cm x 1.5mm and 2 sheets of about 30cm x 25cm x 1.5mm

description: This loose skirt made from several cut-down sheets of metal has been hardened to provide maximum protection for your most vulnerable area.

name.str: pair of sheet metal knee guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal knee guards

description: Two small half-cylinders of sheet metal cut down and hammered to fit over the front of your knees.  They make kneeling painful, but don't impede running much.
//: The weight assumes 3 sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal knee guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal knee guards

description: Knee guards of sheet metal, hardened to protect your kneecaps from any feral with a bat.

name.str: pair of XL sheet metal leg guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL sheet metal leg guards

name.str: pair of XS sheet metal leg guards

description: Leg guards made of stacked paper sheets held together with duct tape.

description: Leg guards made of thick chunks of tire held together with duct tape.

description: A pair of leg guards made from thick chunks of tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

pairs of motorcycle jeans

description: A pair of thick jeans interwoven with Kevlar for added durability and sporting integrated kneepads and flank protection, typically worn by motorcyclists to protect from road rash.

name.str_pl: pairs of armored jeans

description: A pair of jeans reinforced with hard plastic knee pads and metal sheets.  The end product is not very sturdy and somewhat cumbersome, but protective.

name.str_pl: pairs of hardened armored jeans

description: A pair of jeans reinforced with hard plastic knee pads and hardened steel sheets.  Although its high protection outweighs its encumbrance, it's not really sturdy.

This is a heavy pair of trousers armored in Kevlar, Nomex, and foam padding, for use by explosive ordnance disposal technicians.  While it offers near complete coverage in fragmentation resistant materials, it still offers insufficient protection from ballistic threats.

This is a heavy pair of trousers armored in Kevlar, Nomex, and foam padding, for use by explosive ordnance disposal technicians in 'non-permissive environments'.  While it offers near complete coverage in fragmentation resistant materials, it still offers insufficient protection from ballistic threats.  These trousers are lighter than normal EOD armor to provide more maneuverability.
A light leg guard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.

name.str: XL mild steel light leg guard

description: A light leg guard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.

name.str: XL medium steel light leg guard

description: A light leg guard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.

name.str: XL high steel light leg guard

description: A light leg guard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
A light leg guard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
A leg guard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.
A leg guard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.
A leg guard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.
A leg guard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
A leg guard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
A heavy leg guard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.

description: A heavy leg guard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.

name.str: XL medium steel heavy leg guard

description: A heavy leg guard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.

name.str: XL high steel heavy leg guard

description: A heavy leg guard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
A heavy leg guard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.

name.str_pl: pairs of leather-padded pants

description: A pair of tough canvas pants with sections from leather pants affixed, excluding the joints.  Offers mild protection without compromising mobility too much, but a lot of the pockets have been removed to make room for the leather.

name.str_pl: pairs of cloth-padded pants

description: A pair of tough canvas pants with sections of cotton sewn onto it in a crossing pattern, clearly done by an amateur.

description: Hard leg guards used by riot police.

description: A pair of tough leather leg guards.  Light and comfortable.
